link.title: NECSD Virtual Learning

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.strong: A notice to our NECSD community

div.p: To our community of students, leaders, teachers, staff, and families: As we all work to navigate the continuous updates coming in regarding the novel coronavirus, COVID-19, our district is developing plans for potential distance learning experiences (digital and non-digital) for the purposes of continuity of education. Our primary goal is for our community to be safe and healthy. As it has become necessary to extend the school closures beyond the initial period, we have provided more details to students, families, and staff regarding expectations and will continue to update guidance as necessary.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-c5RTEf purZT-AhqUyc-c5RTEf pSzOP-AhqUyc-c5RTEf jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque

div.p: Review this video created by our district staff to support you in getting online with your device.
If you have technical difficulties and need to request support beyond what's available from this video, please email submit a helpdesk ticket HERE
